account_creation_privacy_statement.message: 我同意 Ghostery $LINK_PS_START$隐私声明$LINK_PS_END$中所述的数据使用行为及其$LINK_UA_START$许可协议$LINK_UA_END$中的条款。

alert_ad_block_off.message: 增强版广告拦截功能已关闭。广告不会被拦截。

alert_ad_block_on.message: 增强型广告拦截功能已开启。广告将被拦截。

alert_anti_track_off.message: 增强型反跟踪功能已关闭。个人数据不会匿名化。

alert_anti_track_on.message: 增强型反跟踪功能已开启。个人数据将匿名化。

alert_site_restricted.message: 网站已列入黑名单。在此网站上，跟踪器将被拦截，反跟踪功能将启用。

alert_site_restricted_off.message: 网站不再位于黑名单中。

alert_site_trusted.message: 网站已列入白名单。在此网站上，跟踪器将启用，反跟踪功能将关闭。

alert_site_trusted_off.message: 网站不再位于白名单中。

alert_smart_block_off.message: 智能拦截功能已关闭。跟踪器拦截功能将不会自动调整。

alert_smart_block_on.message: 智能拦截功能已开启。将调整跟踪器拦截功能以优化页面性能。

all.description: Default setting in the 'filter by type' dropdown for the tag browser. Doesn't filter anything out. Should read as 'Show all'.

blocked.description: Select this to show only blocked (checked) tags in the tag browser. Should read as 'Show blocked'.

blocked_redirect_action_through_once_tit.description: Title for the 'Allow once' button on the blocked redirect page.

blocked_redirect_page_title.description: Page title for blocked_redirect.html which appears when a redirect is blocked.

blocked_redirect_prevent.description: Text appearing on block_redirect.html when a redirect is blocked. Should appear inside "redirect-prevent" div.
blocked_redirect_prevent.message: Ghostery 阻止了从 $BREAK$ $SP_O_START$$ORIGIN$$SP_END$ 到 $SP_D_START$$DESTINATION$$SP_END$ 的重定向，$BREAK$后者属于$A_START$$APP$$A_END$。$BREAK$

blocked_redirect_url_content.description: Text appearing on block_redirect.html when a redirect is blocked and a final 'destination' URL is successfully found.
blocked_redirect_url_content.message: 此跟踪代码似乎重定向到 $BREAK$$A_START$$REDIRECT_URL$$A_END$。如果此链接没有问题并且您想继续，请点击下面的图标允许$APP$并重新加载。
